JobFullDesc:
NIKE is an iconic global brand and a technology company that powers our world’s athletes. At Nike, if you have a body, you are an athlete.
s23NYC is Nike’s first digital experience studio and the driving force behind some of the brand’s most memorable experiential community shopping moments (as featured in Fast Company, Engadget, TechCrunch and others). We are a dedicated team of engineers and content creators passionate about reimagining how Nike’s most engaged fans discover and think about their kicks. With an obsession for sneakers and an emphasis on rewarding the community that loves them, s23NYC creates distinctive, interactive, and sometimes mischievous features for the Nike SNKRS community across mobile and web.
In the last three years, SNKRS has scaled to over 30 countries and has seen revenue skyrocket to over $1B. As quoted in a Nike earnings announcement from Nike CEO John Donahoe, “SNKRS continues to be a key part of Nike’s competitive advantage.” Our studio has all the passion and excitement of a start-up, but with the scale, stability, and benefits of Nike. We'd love you to join us!
As Engineering Manager for the SNKRS web experience, you will play a crucial role in evolving the way our consumers interact with SNKRS online. Creating new ways to discover content about sneakers and sneaker culture, expanding digital footwear and apparel launch capabilities into new countries, and enabling our network of retail partners to tap into our SNKRS tech are just some of the exciting opportunities ahead. In this role, you'll lead our outstanding team of web engineers at Nike’s world headquarters in Beaverton, OR, as we continue to build on our success.

What You’ll Do


Hire and develop outstanding engineering talent
Coach your team to help them achieve peak performance
Support your team by clearing roadblocks and getting them what they need to be successful
Translate organizational strategy into meaningful measures and team goals
Guide your team through Agile planning and decision making
Coordinate the operational support process/schedule plus act as the backstop for production incidents
Work with product and program managers to plan project resourcing and timelines based on team skills and availability
Influence the future of our digital products using your insight into technological capabilities and trends
